name: Lightweight
description: When you use an item, mobility +1 for all HGs in this turn.

name: Lightweight
description: When you use an item, mobility +2 for all HGs in this turn.

name: Adjustment
description: Using your faction tech reduces 1 random HG's CD by 1 turn.

name: Adjustment
description: Using your faction tech reduces 1 random HG's CD by 2 turns.

name: Backline Reshuffling
description: Using an HG's skill reduces the CD of your faction tech by 1 turn. Each piece can only trigger this once per turn.

name: Backline Reshuffling
description: Using an HG's skill reduces the CD of your faction tech by 2 turns. Each piece can only trigger this once per turn.

name: Route Planning
description: When you use an HG's skill, your rolls in the current turn will be no smaller than 3.

name: Route Planning
description: When you use an HG's skill, your rolls in the current turn will be no smaller than 4.

name: Trajectory Calibration
description: RFs attack range +1, max. HP -2.

name: Trajectory Calibration
description: RFs attack range +2, max. HP -2.

name: Point-Blank Firing
description: RFs DMG +1, max. HP -2.

name: Point-Blank Firing
description: RFs DMG +2, max. HP -2.

name: Situation Assessment
description: If you have 2 RFs on the board, gain 1 additional battle die when initiating attacks.

name: Situation Assessment
description: If you have 1 RF on the board, gain 1 additional battle die when initiating attacks.

name: All-Terrain Vehicle
description: SMGs have a 60% chance of triggering Turbo on an enemy grid.

name: All-Terrain Vehicle
description: SMG can trigger Turbo on any grid.

name: Charged Momentum
description: Turbo distance +2 for SMGs at 70% health or above.

name: Charged Momentum
description: Turbo distance +4 for SMGs at 70% health or above.

name: Auxiliary Potential
description: When an SMG triggers Turbo, Turbo occurs twice. Can only take effect once per turn.

name: Auxiliary Potential
description: When an SMG triggers Turbo, Turbo occurs 3 times. Can only take effect once per turn.

name: First-Aid Drone
description: Randomly regenerate one of your piece's health by 50%.

name: En Garde
description: When a piece is deployed, it gains a 2-point shield.

name: En Garde
description: When a piece is deployed, it gains a 4-point shield.

name: Heavy-Fire Strike
description: Using your faction tech deals 2 points of damage to 1 random enemy piece.

name: Heavy-Fire Strike
description: Using your faction tech deals 4 points of damage to 1 random enemy piece.

name: Exoskeleton Armor
description: Select 1 friendly piece to trigger an instant Turbo, forgoing other grid effects.

name: Carpet Bombing
description: Using your faction tech deals 1 point of damage to all pieces on the board. Can only take effect once per turn.

name: Carpet Bombing
description: Using your faction tech deals 2 points of damage to all pieces on the board. Can only take effect once per turn.

name: Reactive Armor
description: When a piece is attacked, damage taken is capped at 10 points.

name: Reactive Armor
description: When a piece is attacked, damage taken is capped at 8 points.

name: Forced March
description: Gain 1 additional movement die this turn.

name: Armed March
description: Mobility +1 for all pieces protected by a shield.

name: Armed March
description: Mobility +2 for all pieces protected by a shield.

name: Advantaged Forces
description: If you have 2 HGs on the board, gain 1 additional movement die.

name: Advantaged Forces
description: If you have 1 HG on the board, gain 1 additional movement die.

name: Teamwork Assault
description: An HG's skill now affects all HGs.

name: Teamwork Assault
description: An HG's skill now affects all HGs; mobility +1.

name: Ember
description: Cause any effect triggered by your death to activate twice.

name: Ember
description: Cause any effect triggered by your death to activate 3 times.

name: Return to Defense Line
description: When an HG dies, gain 1 "Enhanced Velocity" Item Card.

name: Return to Defense Line
description: When an HG dies, gain 1 "Transport Vehicle" Item Card.

name: Suicide Bomb
description: When an HG dies, deal 2 points of damage to all enemies within 2 grids.

name: Suicide Bomb
description: When an HG dies, deal 3 points of damage to all enemies within 2 grids.

name: Back to Zero
description: RFs are perpetually in a damaged state.

name: Back to Zero
description: RFs are perpetually in a damaged state and immune to max. HP debuffs.

name: Defend to the Death
description: DMG +2 for RFs in a damaged state. This card is 2 Tokens more expensive than other Effect Cards of the same level.

name: Defend to the Death
description: DMG +3 for RFs in a damaged state. This card is 2 Tokens more expensive than other Effect Cards of the same level.

name: Precision
description: Attack range +1 for RFs in a damaged state.

name: Precision
description: Attack range +2 for RFs in a damaged state.

name: Accurate Strike
description: When an RF attacks an enemy with more than 10 HP, deal an extra 2 points of damage.

name: Accurate Strike
description: When an RF attacks an enemy with more than 10 HP, deal an extra 3 points of damage.

name: Prepared Magazine
description: Using an RF's skill has a 25% chance of resetting the skill's CD.

name: Prepared Magazine
description: Using an RF's skill has a 50% chance of resetting the skill's CD.

name: Scheduled Standby
description: Turbo distance +1 for SMGs. If you have other Turbo-related buffs, Turbo distance +1 on top of that.

name: Scheduled Standby
description: Turbo distance +2 for SMGs. If you have other Turbo-related buffs, Turbo distance +2 on top of that.

name: Secure the Bag
description: Using an SMG's skill regenerates 1 HP.

name: Secure the Bag
description: Using an SMG's skill regenerates 2 HP.

name: Maintenance
description: When an SMG takes damage, gain 1 extra HP the next time it regenerates health. This effect stacks.

name: Maintenance
description: When an SMG takes damage, gain 2 extra HP the next time it regenerates health. This effect stacks.

name: Ram
description: SMGs deal 2 points of damage to enemies in their Turbo trajectory.

name: Ram
description: SMGs deal 3 points of damage to enemies in their Turbo trajectory.

name: Saturation Interference
description: When an AR is enhanced, deal 2 points of damage to all enemies within 1 grid.

name: Saturation Interference
description: When an AR is enhanced, deal 3 points of damage to all enemies within 1 grid.

name: Secret Intelligence
description: Gather all 5 pieces of intelligence to complete a covert mission and win the game (+10 points).

name: Secret Intelligence
description: Gather all 5 pieces of intelligence to complete a covert mission and win the game (+10 points).

name: Secret Intelligence
description: Gather all 5 pieces of intelligence to complete a covert mission and win the game (+10 points).

name: Secret Intelligence
description: Gather all 5 pieces of intelligence to complete a covert mission and win the game (+10 points).

name: Secret Intelligence
description: Gather all 5 pieces of intelligence to complete a covert mission and win the game (+10 points).

name: Power of Preparation
description: Reduce faction tech CD by 1 turn.

name: Power of Preparation
description: Reduce CD of faction tech and all pieces' skills by 1 turn.

name: Accessory Kit
description: Regenerate 1 HP on a random damaged piece at the end of your turn.

name: Accessory Kit
description: Regenerate 2 HP on a random damaged piece at the end of your turn.

name: Planned Operation
description: Choose a roll from 1 to 6.

name: Intense Fire
description: DMG +2 for 1 friendly piece on the board, lasting for 1 turn.

name: Enhanced Velocity
description: Mobility +2 for 1 friendly piece on the board, lasting for 1 turn.

name: Range Table Calibration
description: Attack range +1 for 1 friendly piece on the board, lasting for 1 turn.

name: Ammo Delivery
description: Devastation +1, lasting for 1 turn.

name: Enemy at the Gates
description: When all your Effect Cards are prismatic and at level 2, you win the game (+10 points).

name: Enemy at the Gates
description: When all your Effect Cards are prismatic and at level 2, you win the game (+10 points).

name: Scout
description: Mobility +2, lasting for 1 turn.

name: Snipe
description: Deal 4 points of damage to an enemy piece within 6 grids.

name: Special Assault
description: Enhance self once.

name: Grenade
description: Target any grid within 6 grids and throw a grenade, dealing 3 points of damage to all enemies within 1 grid of the target location.

name: Armament Alteration
description: Gain 1 additional movement die.

name: Targeted Bombing
description: Deal 2 points of damage to 1 piece on the board.

name: Supplies Delivery
description: Enhance 1 friendly piece. Can be used multiple times in the same turn, but it costs 5 Luffberry Token per use starting from the 2nd use.

name: Heavy Reinforcement
description: Regenerate 2 HP and grant 1 shield point to 1 piece on the board.

name: Armament Alteration
Explosive Force
description: When an HG is deployed, the distance of its first move is doubled.

name: Explosive Force
description: When an HG is deployed, the distance of its first move is tripled.

name: Troop Carrier
description: Deploy a piece.

name: Spare Accessory
description: Enhance a piece. The enhancement is independent of all other Effect Cards.

name: Transport Vehicle
description: Mobility +4 for 1 friendly piece on the board, lasting for 1 turn.

name: Hypercharge
description: HGs mobility +1. The effect is doubled whenever you use a HG's skill. Stacks up to 4 times.

name: Hypercharge
description: HGs mobility +2. The effect is doubled whenever you use a HG's skill. Stacks up to 4 times.

name: Common Enemy
description: When an HG dies, gain 2 Luffberry Tokens.

name: Common Enemy
description: When an HG dies, gain 4 Luffberry Tokens.

name: Countermeasure
description: When an HG at full health comes under attack, your roll will be no smaller than the number of pieces you have on the board.

name: Countermeasure
description: When an HG at full health comes under attack, your roll will be no smaller than the number of pieces you have on the board +2.

name: Overclock Calibration
description: Enhancement has a chance of gaining a +2 bonus, but also has a smaller chance of failing and causing Dazed for 1 turn.

name: Overclock Calibration
description: Enhancement gains a guaranteed +2 bonus, but also has a smaller chance of failing and causing Dazed for 1 turn.

name: Specialized Enhancement
description: Enhancement has a chance of granting immunity against battle damage once.

name: Specialized Enhancement
description: Enhancement has a chance of granting immunity against battle damage or making a guaranteed kill once.

name: Course Plotting
description: When an SMG triggers Turbo, gain 1 Item Card that grants a friendly piece 1 bonus step. Each piece can only trigger this once per turn.

name: Course Plotting
description: When an SMG triggers Turbo, gain 1 Item Card that grants a friendly piece 2 bonus steps. Each piece can only trigger this once per turn.

name: Course Plotting
description: Move 1 friendly piece on the board 1 step forward, triggering the grid effect.

name: Course Plotting
description: Move 1 friendly piece on the board 2 steps forward, triggering the grid effect.

name: Heavy Armament
description: SMGs max. HP +2, mobility -1.

name: Heavy Armament
description: SMGs max. HP +4, mobility -1.

name: Firepower Accumulation
description: Whenever an SMG regenerates health, DMG +1 to a max. of 3 stacks. All stacks are removed after 1 attack.

name: Firepower Accumulation
description: Whenever an SMG regenerates health, DMG +1 to a max. of 6 stacks. All stacks are removed after 1 attack.

name: Self-Initiated Repair
description: SMGs regenerate 1 HP for every additional move within the same turn (Turbo counts).

name: Self-Initiated Repair
description: SMGs regenerate 2 HP for every additional move within the same turn (Turbo counts).

name: Focused Cooldown
description: When an RF is deployed, reduce initial CD by 1 turn.

name: Focused Cooldown
description: When an RF is deployed, reduce initial CD by 2 turns.

name: Target the Weakness
description: RF skill DMG +2. This card is 2 Tokens more expensive than other Effect Cards of the same level.

name: Target the Weakness
description: RF skill DMG +3. This card is 2 Tokens more expensive than other Effect Cards of the same level.

name: Visual Range Override
description: RFs gain a marker with every skill activation; attack range +1 with every 2 stacks. All stacks are removed after 1 attack.

name: Visual Range Override
description: RFs gain a marker with every skill activation; attack range +1 with every stack. All stacks are removed after 1 attack.

name: Standby Maneuver
description: When an RF moves, reduce CD by 1 turn. Can only take effect once per turn.

name: Standby Maneuver
description: When an RF moves, reduce CD by 2 turns. Can only take effect once per turn.

name: Thermal Discharge
description: When an AR is enhanced, receive 1 additional enhancement, lasting for 1 turn only. The enhancement is independent of all other Effect Cards.

name: Thermal Discharge
description: When an AR is enhanced, receive 2 additional enhancements, lasting for 1 turn only. The enhancement is independent of all other Effect Cards.

name: Quantified Enhancement
description: Have a 5% chance of gaining an enhancement-related Item Card at the start of each round. Each AR on the board grants an additional 5%.

name: Quantified Enhancement
description: Have a 10% chance of gaining an enhancement-related Item Card at the start of each round. Each AR on the board grants an additional 5%.

name: Common Front
description: If an AR receives an enhancement while standing on a grid of your own faction, gain 2 Luffberry Tokens. Each piece can trigger this once per turn.

name: Common Front
description: If an AR receives an enhancement while standing on a grid of your own faction, gain 4 Luffberry Tokens. Each piece can trigger this once per turn.

name: Reverse Fire
description: If you currently have the fewest points out of all the players, deal 1 point of damage to all pieces on the board when you deploy a piece.

name: Reverse Fire
description: If you currently have the fewest points out of all the players, deal 2 points of damage to all pieces on the board when you deploy a piece.
